citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC has been performing semi-annual reviews of animal facilities but has not conducted a review of the program
for humane care and use of animals at least once every six months.
The semi-annual review of the Program is important to determine the status of the animal use program at the institution in
order to assure the proper care and welfare of the animals.
The IACUC must review the animal use program, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper care and
welfare of the animals.
Correct from this date 5/9/23 forward for all future semi-annual reviews of the Program.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC has been performing semi-annual reviews  of animal facilities but has not conducted a review of the program 
for humane care and use of animals at least once every six months.  
The semi-annual review of the Program is important to determine the status of the animal use program at the institution in 
order to assure the proper care and welfare of the animals. 
The IACUC must review the animal use program, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper care and 
welfare of the animals. 
Correct from this date 5/9/23 forward for all future semi-annual reviews of the Program. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian. 
 
 n
